definition: to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend
the chirping of birds or insects/noise/clamor/buzzing/disturbance

sentences.english: One key problem when analyzing actual acoustic signal in phase space is how to reduce the noise and lower the embedding dimension.
sentences.chinese: 實際水聲信號在相空間中分析時的首要問題是降噪。

sentences.english: In this paper, a translation invariance wavelet transform is applied to image denoise.
sentences.chinese: 文中主要研究平移不變小波變換在圖象降噪中的應用。

sentences.english: You can configure performance reports for noise reduction.
sentences.chinese: 您可以配置性能報告以便降噪。

sentences.english: If noise reduction is enabled, an information bar will display in the report.
sentences.chinese: 如果啓用降噪，會在報告中顯示一個信息欄。

sentences.english: Pitch concrete pavement with water-draining and noise-reducing functions.
sentences.chinese: 排水降噪瀝青混凝土路面。

sentences.english: However, when using the denoised signal with the codec, there is an additional benefit.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何編解碼器使用降噪信號都是有利的。

sentences.english: Superior sound performance with two noise-canceling mics .
sentences.chinese: 出衆的聲音表現有兩個降噪麥克風。

sentences.english: The paper introduces a noise suppression of an electric power shelter.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種電站方艙的降噪設計。

sentences.english: Experiment of de-noising demonstrates its validity and clinical application value.
sentences.chinese: 降噪實驗表明了該方法的有效性和臨牀應用價值。

sentences.english: The measurability of effects on reducing the low-frequency noise was indicated.
sentences.chinese: 指出了低頻降噪效果的可測性。

sentences.english: As with other noise-reduction plugins, Noise Ninja needs to estimate the noise in your image.
sentences.chinese: 與其他降噪插件，噪聲忍者的需求估計噪聲中的形象。

sentences.english: The phase space denoising is applied to speech enhancement.
sentences.chinese: 將相空間降噪方法應用於語音增強之中。

sentences.english: Simple anechoic chamber was used for noise reduction.
sentences.chinese: 根據降噪量要求對設備間採用簡易消聲室設計。

sentences.english: The subject presents a novel complex multi-recursive noise reduction algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 本課題提出了一種多重遞歸複合降噪的新算法。

sentences.english: Noise-cancelling microphone enhances sound quality and voice-dialing performance.
sentences.chinese: 降噪麥克風提高音質和語音撥號的性能。

sentences.english: At the same time, de-noising threshold value is determined by the improved method.
sentences.chinese: 同時，採用改進的方法來確定降噪閾值。
